entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
